item.title: .NET Observability with OpenTelemetry – Part 3: Distributed Tracing using AWS X-Ray
item.description: Traces capture requests through services and components, and are essential for understanding application workflows. They are key for pinpointing bottlenecks and identifying hotspots. Particularly vital in microservices, traces reveal the interplay in modern applications, aiding developers and operators in visualizing request paths for effective issue diagnosis. In the first post of this series, we instrumented […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/net-observability-with-opentelemetry-part-3-distributed-tracing-using-aws-x-ray/
